citation: Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Order 2001 (Tas)
text:
Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Order 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Tasmanian Building and Construction Industry Training Board, make the following order under section 5(2) , (3) and (4) of the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Act 1990 .

15 October 2001

G. S. M. Green

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Fran Bladel

Minister for Education

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Order 2001 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Act 1990 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Act 1990 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 October 2001

This order is administered in the Department of Education.
